title: New: Disclosure XLR8R Mix
body:
This was the year of disclosure.

They came, they stayed and it looks like they’re in it for the long haul. They’re also ending the year in style with this pretty lengthy mix they put together for [XLR8R](http://www.xlr8r.com/podcast/2012/12/disclosure).

**[Download the thing here.](http://www.xlr8r.com/podcast/2012/12/disclosure#)**

1 Jay Lotus “1945″  
2 Medlar “Govern” (Wolf)  
3 Inner City “Ahnongay” (KMS)  
4 Letherette “Warstones” (Ninja Tune)  
5 Native Soul feat. Trey Washington “A New Day (Spencer Parker’s a Gun for Hire Remix)” (Defected)  
6 Janet Jackson feat. Nelly “Call on Me (Disclosure Bootleg)”  
7 Dusky “Dummy”  
8 Eli Escobar feat. Lindsey Caldwell “I Believe” (Dither Down)  
9 Jordan Peak “Pass the Roach” (Robsoul)  
10 Disclosure “What’s in Your Head VIP”  
11 Jeremy Sylvester “If You Want Me” (Urban Dubz)  
12 Jhelisa “Friendly Pressure (From Midnight Mix)” (Dorado)  
13 Eats Everything “Trubble VIP”  
14 Shadow Child “The Verdict Part II” (Food)  
15 Disclosure “Latch (?? Remix)”  
16 Unknown “#52″  
17 Leon Vynehall “Untitled017″ (Well Rounded)  
18 Jessie Ware “Running (Disclosure VIP Remix)”

excerpt.full: This was the year of disclosure. They came, they stayed and it looks like they’re in it for the long haul. They’re also ending the year in style with this pretty lengthy mix they put together for XLR8R. Download the thing here. 1 Jay Lotus “1945″ 2 Medlar “Govern” (Wolf) 3 Inner City “Ahnongay” (KMS) \[…\]
excerpt.short: This was the year of disclosure.
